Module gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind
Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema

Class BindingConstraintLoader

java.lang.Object
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.AbstractLoader<List<IConstraintSet>>
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.BindingConstraintLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
IConstraintLoader, ILoader<List<IConstraintSet>>
public class BindingConstraintLoader extends AbstractLoader<List<IConstraintSet>> implements IConstraintLoader
Provides methods to load a constraint set expressed in XML.

Loaded constraint instances are cached to avoid the need to load them for every use. Any constraint set imported is also loaded and cached automatically.
